attributes.action: Free Vote for all e-petition debates
attributes.additional_details: We the undersigned call upon our government to guarantee that all e-petitions which receive over 100,000 votes and are debated in the House of Commons will receive a free vote and will not be subject to a 3 line whip or any other ministerial or party political influence.

rejection.details: Whipping is a matter for political parties, and not HM Government.
